To retrieve the user's profile, just make a GET call using basic authentication with the user's Sendible username and password

====URL:====
http://sendible.com/api/v1/profile.format

====Formats:====
xml, json

====HTTP Methods:====
GET

====Authentication:====
Basic authentication with username and password of the Sendible user.

====Success Response:====
{{{
<user>
  <email>martinehammar@gmail.com</email>
  <fullname>Martine</fullname>
  <id type="integer">3</id>
  <login>martine</login>
  <is-pro type="boolean">true</is-pro>
  <account-type-name>Marketer</account-type-name>
  <total-credits-available type="decimal">2000</total-credits-available>
</user>
}}}

====Error Response:====
{{{
<error>
<type>InvalidUsernamePassword</type>
<message>Username/password is invalid.</message>
</error>
}}}
